name: LocatorAgency
author: Amine BETARI, Agency SQLI-OUJDA

sections.description:
Plugin provides a management system of physical locations, adding a new type of publication ‘locator_agency’, a LOCATOR shortcode is added to a page to display the map and related information. The administration has set up a form for the configuration to display the map.

Features

  1. New custom post type ‘locator_agency’.
  2. ShortCode ‘LOCATOR’ to add a page.
  3. Configuration form to display the map.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Upload the LocatorAgency folder to your site’s wp-content/plugins directory.
  3. Active the plugin in the WordPress Panel.
  4. Start creating new locator.
  5. Setting’s Page (Setting -> Locator Option )
  6. Create a page, then put the shortcode [LOCATOR]
  7. Visit the page created
sections.faq: There are currently no FAQs at this time.
